title: nenjE kalpaka
sahitya:
nenjE kalpaka annai irukkak-kavalai En nI alaivadEn


anupallavi

  anjElenru abhayamum varamum aLith-taNaikkum ulagannai irukka


caraNam    mayil tOghai nigar malaraNi kuzhalum maNi makuTamum kamala malar pazhikkum
vadana pUrNa candranum karuNaipozhi mandahAsan nilavum aruL shuranda
kayal kaNgaL iraNDum pavaLa idazh kavindha muttup pal varishaiyum
kaNdu-koNdirundAl bhava nOyarum kaN paDaitta payanum aDaiyalAm
